question: Who named as FMSCI National MotorSports Person of the Year 2017?
explanation: Anindith Reddy was presented the 'FMSCI National MotorSports Person of the Year 2017' award at a function held in Chennai. Anindith Reddy is 26 years old. He hails from Hyderabad. FIA world motor sport council member Gautam Singhania and FMSCI (Federation of Motor Sports Clubs of India) president Akbar Ebrahim handed over the award to Anindith Reddy. KD Madan, a former FMSCI president and K1000 champion, was presented the FMSCI Lifetime Achievement Award.
